Package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App

package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App
  • Class
    Description
    Constants
    This class provides some useful constants for the project
    DatabaseRow
    This class provides the template for a row inside the leaderboard RecyclerView
    ESPSteering
    This class parses the ESP32's Accelerometer/Gyro-Value-Strings received through the MPU_TOPIC, so that the GameLogic Class can access that data to calculate game-physics etc.
    ESPSteeringTest
    will execute on the development machine (host).
    FirstFragment
    This class implements the Fragment framework and represents the View present when first opening the app.
    FirstFragmentTest
     
    GameLogic
    This class handles most of the game's logic, calculations and physics, and acts as a controller inside the project, directing requests to other classes.
    GameLogicTest
     
    LeaderboardDatabase
    This class represents a SQLite database for storing leaderboard data.
    LeaderboardDatabaseTest
     
    LeaderboardEntry
    This class defines a template for leaderboard entries
    MainActivity
    This class acts as the main activity of the android application.
    MqttCallbackListener
    provides interface to handle MQTT events for clients to implement
    MqttManager
    This class handles MQTT connection and handles MQTT events
    MqttManagerTest
     
    MyAdapter
    Adapter class for populating a RecyclerView with a list of DatabaseRow objects.
    MyAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class representing an item view in the RecyclerView.
    MyAdapterTest
     
    PhoneSteering
    This class utilizes the sensors inside the Smartphone to parse accelerometer/gyro values, so that the GameLogic class can use that data to calculate game-physics etc.
    PhoneSteeringTest
     
    SecondFragment
    This Fragment is displayed when starting the game and thus handles all the preparation and executions associated with running the game itself.
    SecondFragmentTest
     
    SettingsDatabase
    SettingsDatabase class for managing the settings data in a SQLite database.
    SettingsDatabaseTest
     
    SettingsFragment
    This Fragment is displayed whenever the user selects the MenuItem with the ID of "action_settings".
    SettingsFragmentTest
     
    SoundPlayer
    This class provides the functionality to play sounds
